page.title: 02CLUBS IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: {FLIGHT REFUELLING SPORTS CLUB}at Merley has 22acres approx.It has about 2000 members.Indoor activities are pool,squash,skittles,snooker,table-ten nis & darts.It has a large model rail way.Outdoors it has a golf-course, other sports are football & cricket, rifle,pistol & air-gun shooting,a pigeon club & 2 gauge railway for children.It is manned by volunteers. {CANFORD & MERLEY W I.}meets monthly at Merley School.There are 55 members. {MERLEY & WIMBORNE MINSTER T.G.}meets monthly at The Lantern.There are 35 members.Plans are in hand to form a {MERLEY YOUTH}CLUB,which hopes to start in May l986 & meet in the old primary school.There is a{BEARWOOD, CANFORD {MAGNA &MERLEY RESIDENTS ASSOC.}formed to look after the interests of local residents{.MERLEY NEWCOMERS LADIES GRP meets fortnightly & has 55 members.
